description.name: DomainNameApi
description.tagline: A leading reseller domain registrar supporting over 20 million domains.
description.long:
## Apply for an account
WHMCS users get exclusive access to signup with no setup fees and preferential pricing. [Learn more and signup »](https://www.domainnameapi.com/become-a-reseller)
features: Ability to View/Change Nameservers & WHOIS Info
Domain Locking, ID Protection, EPP Code Retrieval
